attributes.title: Life Has No Full Stop!
attributes.description:
Satsang Delivered On 20 February 2020

*TYAGA IS NOT ONLY THE STRATEGY FOR MAKING YOU HEALTHY, IT IS ALSO FOR ATTRACTING THE WEALTH. IT MEANS, WHERE JUST BY YOUR PRESENCE, YOU WILL GENERATE AND ATTRACT WEALTH AND ALL THE RESOURCES AROUND YOU LIKE  HOW A MAGNET ATTRACTS EVERYTHING AROUND IT. TYAGA IS A STRATEGY FOR LONG LIFE, GENERATING AND ATTRACTING RESOURCES.

*TYAGA CREATES SUCH A SPACE IN YOU, EVEN BLISS, CONSCIOUSNESS - ALL THE DIVINE EXPERIENCES - WAIT TO MANIFEST IN YOU. EVEN THEY FEEL YOU ARE A BLESSING FOR THEM! THEY ARE SO PLEASED AND HAPPY TO MANIFEST IN YOU. THEY FEEL BLESSED BY YOUR PRESENCE. 

*IN EVERY LEVEL, TYAGA IS A ‘POWER’. IT IS NOT RENUNCIATION. TYAGA AWAKENS YOUR KUNDALINI SHAKTI INTENSELY. NOTHING IS MORE INTENSE AND CAPABLE OF TRIGGERING YOUR KUNDALINI SHAKTI THAN TYAGA. TYAGA IS FEROCIOUSLY ASSERTING YOUR PARAMA SATYA, THAT HIGHEST IDENTITY AND MAKING THE LOWEST IDENTITY IRRELEVANT.

*MOST IMPORTANT TRUTH: ‘TYAGA MAKES YOU HAVE THE LARGER VISION ABOUT LIFE.’ ANXIETY, POWERLESSNESS, DEPRESSION, IS ALWAYS HAVING A NARROW IDEA ABOUT LIFE AND GETTING SHAKEN EVEN IF YOUR HUSBAND IS LATE BY ONE HOUR. BY THE TIME HE COMES, YOU WILL IMAGINE TEN ACCIDENTS OR YOU WILL HAVE A DOUBT IF HE RAN AWAY. TYAGA KEEPS YOU COOL WITH THE LARGER VISION. ALL MY SUCCESSFUL SANYASIS HAVE EXTREME TYAGA AS THEIR FOUNDATION, AS THEIR BASIS. THEY ARE MADE OF THE METAL CALLED TYAGA. I HAVE ALSO SEEN THESE PEOPLE BASED ON EXTREME REACTIONARY ASSUMPTIONS. THEY ARE EXTREMELY SHALLOW AND SELFISH. I HAVE SEEN BOTH EXTREMES.

*TYAGA MAKES YOU UNDERSTAND: ‘THERE IS NO FULL STOP IN LIFE, THERE IS ONLY COMMA!’ LIFE HAS NO FULL STOP! EVEN DURING THE MAHAPRALAYA (GREAT DELUGE), PARAMASHIVA HOLDS KASHI IN HIS TRISHUL. ANYONE IN KASHI DOESN'T GET DESTROYED EVEN IN MAHAPRALAYA! IT IS THE AVIMUKTA KSHETRA - THE NEVER FORSAKEN NEVER GIVEN UP LAND! THROUGH THIS, PARAMASHIVA IS TRYING TO TELL: ‘LIFE HAS NO FULL STOP!’ ONLY TYAGIS ARE GIVEN OPPORTUNITY TO LIVE IN KASHI!

*TYAGA GIVES YOU THE PATIENCE TO SEE THE WHOLE LIFE. WHEN MY TEAM REPORT REPORTS TO ME, ‘SWAMIJI, THIS IS THE UPDATE FROM THE LEGAL TEAM’ OR ‘THESE ARE THE ATTACKS / HATE SPEECH FROM MEDIA SIDE,’ I WILL BE IN THE SPACE OF TYAGA AND SEE THE LARGER VISION. BUT PEOPLE WHO ARE SEEING THE SMALL VISION, GET ANXIETY, FEAR, DEPRESSION, AND GET PERTURBED. I WILL SIMPLY SAY, ‘OK, NEXT!’ MY TEAM WILL ASK ME, ‘HOW ARE YOU HANDLING THE WHOLE THING SO COOLLY?’ FIRST THING IS TYAGA. IT GIVES YOU THE LARGER VISION AND MAKES YOU SEE HOW THE WHOLE THING IS BEAUTIFULLY GOING IN OUR FAVOUR! IF YOU ARE GETTING PERTURBED, YOU WILL BE TRYING TO SHOW YOU ARE SO MUCH CONCERNED FOR ME, BUT YOU WILL NEVER BE A HELP FOR ME OR MY VISION. YOU MAY ACT AND DO DRAMA TO SHOW YOU ARE CONCERNED, BUT ONLY TYAGIS HELP MY MISSION. ONLY THEY SUPPORT ME AND ARE A STRENGTH FOR ME AND THE WORLD. 

*WITH REACTIONARY ASSUMPTIONS, YOU BECOME A ‘KULLA NARI’. WITH TYAGA, YOU BECOME THE ‘NANDI’ (SACRED VEHICLE) OF PARAMASHIVA! TYAGA GIVES YOU THE STRENGTH TO SEE LIFE. 

*THIS WHOLE ATTACK, SCANDALS, LAWFARE AND ABUSES ON ME, IS A VERY NICE WAY TO FILTER AND GET ONLY TYAGIS AROUND ME! ONLY THOSE HAVING TYAGA CAN SEE THE LARGER VISION AND STILL FEEL SECURED ABOUT ME IN THEIR LIFE AND ABOUT THEIR LIFE WITH ME. THEY FEELING SECURE THAT I WILL WIN IN THIS WAR AND THEY FEELING THEY HAVE A PLACE IN MY LIFE AND I HAVE A PLACE IN THEIR LIFE WILL HAPPEN ONLY IF YOU HAVE A VERY HIGH LEVEL OF TYAGA. IT SHOWS YOUR STRONG LOVE FOR ME WHEN IN SPITE OF EVERYTHING YOU FEEL THESE SECURITIES. THAT TYAGA MAKES YOU A DIFFERENT METAL ALTOGETHER AND YOU BECOME QUALIFIED FOR KAILASA! PARAMASHIVA IS FILTERING AND COLLECTING THE BASE, FOUNDATIONAL MATERIAL FOR KAILASA FOR THE LAST SIX MONTHS!

*TO BE WITH ME IN KAILASA, YOU NEED MULTILAYERS OF STRONG ‘FEELING SECUREDNESS’. THAT COMES ONLY WITH INTENSE TYAGA. 

*WITH THE GRACE OF PARAMASHIVA AND PROTECTION OF KALABHAIRAVA, I HAVE ALREADY WON THE WAR. BY SHIVARATRI, PARAMASHIVA IS TAKING KAILASA TO THE NEXT LEVEL. HE IS GIVING A VERY POSITIVE, AUSPICIOUS BREAKTHROUGH FOR ME, KAILASA AND ALL OF US. IT HAS ALREADY STARTED! I WILL BE REVEALING MORE INFORMATION TO THE WHOLE WORLD.
